item.name: Bandages
item.description: Heals an ally 20 health.

item.name: Health Potion
item.description: Heals an ally 50 health.

item.name: Mana Potion
item.description: Heals an ally 25 mana.

item.name: Smoke Orb
item.description: Lets the party escape from combat when used.

item.name: Pure Water
item.description: Revives one ally with 10 health.

item.name: Fungus
item.description: Removes all negative effects on one ally.

item.name: Fire Stone
item.description: Deals 20 fire damage to one enemy.

item.name: Water Stone
item.description: Deals 20 water damage to one enemy.

item.name: Earth Stone
item.description: Deals 20 earth damage to one enemy.

item.description: Deals 20 electricity damage to one enemy.

item.name: Light Stone
item.description: Deals 20 light damage to one enemy.

item.name: Shadow Stone
item.description: Deals 20 Shadow damage to one enemy.
